channel.title: IceAgeScapev1[[NEW]]1000+veiws*300+dwlnds*!!!!!!
channel.description:
Please dont flame this is my first source based off of Silab Garza v6 finaly release. Please download this and message me if u have :) I worked hard adding new things!! :) This server has a built in Anti syi system 90% working! Any questions youngbadboi@hotmail.com[color=beige][/color]
Features~~
Anti Syi/Anti Null~ if some one trys to use the same name more then 1 time or same ip they get ip baned a.s.a.p~~ Basicly thats saying if u use more then `1` ip per connection auto ip baned ~ New Train~ coded by me~ New skills ~ coded by me ~ And everything silab garza had:) Changed the home look ~ moved shops so its less crowded~
Normal Commands ::train ~coded by me~ ::home ::shops~ coded by me ~ ::jad ::kqueen ::defender ::dag ::pk ::funpk ::pkzone ::pkbox ::wyvern ~~~ much more just putting simple ones ~~~ ::suggest
Mod commands ~ALL OF THE ABOVE~ ::banuser (name) ::unban ::mute ::unmute ::modzone ::summning
Admin commands ~ALL OF THE ABOUT~ ::jail ::funjail ::unjail ::alert ::rich ::sweet ::adminzone ::modzone~~~ go to the person and get the nulls, then drop them and u get a creture fallowing you :) ~~
Owner commands ~ ALL OF THE ABOVE~ ::rich ::xrichie ::givemod ::giveadmin ::givehiddenmod ::givehiddenadmin ::cart~~~ so jokes everyone can do that though ::kn~~~~~~~~~~~ IMPORTANT~~~~~~~~~~~ this is to kick nulls when your gettin attacked ~~~~
Now for some pics :):D
Home [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape1.png[/img]
::pk ~ pking area ~ [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape10.png[/img]
MORE PKING [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape11.png[/img]
~~Costum skills made by me ~~ [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape32.png[/img]
Start of new train ~ CODED BY ME ~ [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape91.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape95.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape65.png[/img]
~~Defender~~ [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape99-1.png[/img]
DRAGON AREA [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape66.png[/img]
::commands ---This is just some of the commands--- [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape46.png[/img]
COSTUM SHOPS MADE BY ME W000T~~ moved them around from home ~~ [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape7.png[/img]
RARE SHOP FTW! [IMG]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt232/oceanscape2009/Rynescape33.png[/img]
Credits 80% Silab garza 20% To me for ::shops,::skills,::train : ) Also adding some items to shops!
Please tell me what you think and what i can inprove in the future! REMEMBER this is my first post of a server :)
~~~NEW~~~~Download link http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mdwgq4tz2yn http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mdwgq4tz2yn http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mdwgq4tz2yn
Client download http://uppit.com/v/7FK2D5I2 http://uppit.com/v/7FK2D5I2 http://uppit.com/v/7FK2D5I2 NOTE: client is made by silab garza! Backround made by me... any questions add mi msn youngbadboi@hotmail.com!!!

item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Chris GD, post:28, topic:276897”][quote author=Fuzzy Ranqe link=topic=365566.msg2772872#msg2772872 date=1241318198]

I have 11 rep, I’m not here for the rep, I’m here to see how big and good Moparscape can change by a few people doing the right things.

@topic, like i said above good job.

What do you mean by “the right things”?
[/quote]

Such as helping new members out, showing then where to post and making sure they read the rules. If you heard about what Moparisthebest did for the community, it makes you think he is here to make sure the community is up with no problems.

@topic, tyring to stay on topic great job :p[/quote]
lol you dont have to do @topic cause telling him what you mean is on topic its a question ^^

Read full topic
